hadiths.text: It was narrated that Suwiad bin Ghafalah said:"Umar bin Al-Khattab wrote to some of his workers saying: 'Give to the Muslims thickened grape juice when two thirds of it have gone and one-third is left

chapter.ara-name: باب ذِكْرِ مَا يَجُوزُ شُرْبُهُ مِنَ الطِّلاَءِ وَمَا لاَ يَجُوزُ
chapter.eng-name: What Kind of Thickened Grape Juice is Permissible to Drink and What Kind is Not Permitte
